calculator.skipWeekendsInfo: When active, weekends will be skipped for blocks where the selected unit is "days"

leapYear.intro:
In the Gregorian calendar, each leap year has 366 days instead of 365, by extending February to 29 days rather than the common 28. These extra days occur in each year which is an integer multiple of 4 (except for years evenly divisible by 100, which are not leap years unless evenly divisible by 400).
In popular tradition, the leap year would be a harbinger of misfortune, according to the manner of saying "Anno bisesto, anno funesto", which mean "Leap year, baleful year"
leapYear.title: leap year
